sentences.sContent: Go for a walk, fly a kite and visit the zoo.
sentences.sCn: 散散步，放放风筝，逛逛动物园。

sentences.sContent: Almost as if the inner child in us wants to put the rest of the world on hold and just run outside to climb a tree or fly a kite.
sentences.sCn: 仿佛我们内心的童真想要撂下整个世界，就只是跑出去爬爬树，或者放放风筝。

sentences.sContent: India was named best place to fly a kite as the pastime is a daily activity for many Indians.
sentences.sCn: 在印度，放风筝是很多印度人日常生活消遣的活动，所以被评为最适合放风筝的国家。
